org.wildfly.swarm.spi.api

Class SwarmProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.spi.api.SwarmProperties

  • public class SwarmProperties
extends Object
    This class defines all system properties used by Swarm

      • HTTP_EAGER

        public static final String HTTP_EAGER
        Since introducing the delayed open HTTP listeners, it has been determined that maybe it'd be useful to be able to eagerly open the listeners through usage of a property. If non-null, will cause the http listeners to not be lazy.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HTTP_PORT

        public static final String HTTP_PORT
        Sets the HTTP port to be used, defaults to 8080

        Constant Field Values

      • HTTPS_PORT

        public static final String HTTPS_PORT
        Sets the HTTPS port to be used, defaults to 8443

      • CONTEXT_PATH

        public static final String CONTEXT_PATH
        The context path to be used, defaults to /
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUG_PORT

        public static final String DEBUG_PORT
        If provided, the swarm process will pause for debugging on the given port. This option is only available when running an Arquillian test or mvn wildfly-swarm:run, not when executing java -jar. The latter requires normal Java debug agent parameters.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUG_BOOTSTRAP

        public static final String DEBUG_BOOTSTRAP
        If provided, the swarm container will log bootstrap information
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENVIRONMENT

        public static final String ENVIRONMENT
        The environment this process is running on (eg. openshift)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROJECT_STAGE

        public static final String PROJECT_STAGE
        Activates a stage in project-stages.yml
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONSUL_URL

        public static final String CONSUL_URL
        Full qualified http address, i.e. 'http://localhost:8500/
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEPLOYMENT_TIMEOUT

        public static final String DEPLOYMENT_TIMEOUT
        Timeout, in seconds, to wait for a deployment to occur, defaults to 300
